text: Parents, please never send your children here! The teachers here made my 2 children quit piano because of their constant abuse. My students hated piano and cried after every dreaded lesson. I believe that more nurturing and patient teaching would have allowed my children to continue learning piano.

My daughter has improved a lot after learning from Mr Simoh Soh. Thank you so much! She started at 8 with him and within 1.5 years, she is now preparing for her diploma exams. He is a very patient and passionate teacher.
The teachers are very dedicated and good.
